title: Part A
stimulusHtml:
Select a point value to view scoring criteria and/or examples, and to score the response.

One point for stating that the trends are rising or show rising yields.

Two points for comparing how the trend is rising by using data or making specific references from the graph.
descriptions: The response does not correctly compare the data trend from 1960 to 2015 for Latin America and the Caribbean to the trend shown for Europe using one of the following:
The response correctly compares the data trend from 1960 to 2015 for Latin America and the Caribbean to the trend shown for Europe using one of the following:

title: Part B
stimulusHtml:
Select a point value to view scoring criteria and/or examples, and to score the response.

One point for stating that carrying capacity will decrease.

Two points for explaining why increasing grain yields will increase or decrease the carrying capacity by referencing one of the regions shown in the graph.
descriptions: The response does not correctly use the data for one of the regions shown in the graph to explain one of the following reasons why the trend may have an effect on the environmental carrying capacity of agricultural areas:

The response correctly uses the data for one of the regions shown in the graph to explain one of the following reasons why the trend may have an effect on the environmental carrying capacity of agricultural areas:

The response correctly uses the data for one of the regions shown in the graph to explain one of the following reasons why the trend may have an effect on the environmental carrying capacity of agricultural areas:

title: Part C
stimulusHtml:
Select a point value to view scoring criteria and/or examples, and to score the response.

One point for stating that rural populations will decrease in stage 3 of the demographic transition.

Two points for explaining how rural populations decline in stage 3 of the demographic transition due to changes in agricultural production systems or practices.
descriptions: The response does not correctly explain one of the following ways that changes in grain yields may affect rural populations in countries in stage 3 of the demographic transition:
The response correctly explains one of the following ways that changes in grain yields may affect rural populations in countries in stage 3 of the demographic transition:
The response correctly explains one of the following ways that changes in grain yields may affect rural populations in countries in stage 3 of the demographic transition:

title: Part D
stimulusHtml:
Select a point value to view scoring criteria and/or examples, and to score the response.

One point for stating that no patterns of consumption are shown in the graph.

Two points for explaining why the data do not show regional patterns of consumption due to a lack of information regarding where the crops were sold or consumed.
descriptions: The response does not correctly explain one of the following limitations of the data in showing regional patterns of consumption:
The response correctly explains one of the following limitations of the data in showing regional patterns of consumption:
